subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|religion|folklore}} the ''{{w|Hun and po|hun}}'', the soul which goes to heaven, as opposed to the {{zh-l|魄}}, which goes down to the earth with the body at death.
# [[soul]]; [[spirit]]
# [[mood]]
# the [[lofty]] [[spirit]] of a [[nation]] or [[people]]
